h3cBlg.name: h3cBlg

revisions.description: The initial version of this MIB.

h3cBlg.contactinfo: Platform Team H3C Technologies Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China Http://www.h3c.com Zip:100085
h3cBlg.description: This MIB module defines a set of basic objects for configuring switches and routers to set/get balance group information.

CounterClear.name: CounterClear
CounterClear.description: Cleared: reset the value of the group's counter. Nouse: 'nouse' will be returned when getting.

h3cBlgStatsTable.name: h3cBlgStatsTable
h3cBlgStatsTable.description: This table contains the statistics information about balance groups.

h3cBlgIndex.name: h3cBlgIndex
h3cBlgIndex.description: The index of the balance group.

h3cBlgGroupTxPacketCount.name: h3cBlgGroupTxPacketCount
h3cBlgGroupTxPacketCount.description: When retrieved, this object returns the count of packets the balance group has sent.

h3cBlgGroupRxPacketCount.name: h3cBlgGroupRxPacketCount
h3cBlgGroupRxPacketCount.description: When retrieved, this object returns the count of packets the balance group has received.

h3cBlgGroupTxByteCount.name: h3cBlgGroupTxByteCount
h3cBlgGroupTxByteCount.description: When retrieved, this object returns the count of bytes the balance group has sent.

h3cBlgGroupRxByteCount.name: h3cBlgGroupRxByteCount
h3cBlgGroupRxByteCount.description: When retrieved, this object returns the count of bytes the balance group has received.

h3cBlgGroupCountClear.name: h3cBlgGroupCountClear
h3cBlgGroupCountClear.description: This object is used to reset the counter of the balance group. Read operation is meaningless.
